div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxvijmo die
mensis marcij Anno Domini et cetera lxxxjmo

quo die Robertus de crag posuit se in voluntate
balliuorum de amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti clerc scissoris et tenetur emen
dare eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Item dictus Robertus clerc conuictus per assisam amerciatur quia iniuste perturbacione prefatum Rober
tus de crag et emendare tenetur eidem vt Jura volunt

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos penultimo die marcij supradicto Robertus senyour dedit Ro
bertum blindsel et Willelmum tulidef plegios / quod bona clamata et petita per certos mercato
res huius burgi remanebunt infra eundem burgum et non alienabuntur per seipsum nec per quemcumque
alium donec redderit compotum et racionem eorundem bonorum infra vj dies postquam Acceperit litteras compot'
a dictis mercatoribus de quibus bonis ipse robertus senyour se intromisit

Eodem die Johannes de Kintor offerebat preposito et ballivis sicut alias promisit eisdem Jacobum Kintor
fratrem eius plegium pro firme aque sue solucione dimidij rethis de Done

Secundo die mensis aprilis anno quo supra videlicet in curia legali comparuit in Judicio mariota
guthery cum suis prelocutoribus Alexandro de camera et domino alano
de camera et peterunt certa bona sibi deliberarj que quidem bona
alexander baxtar habuit in sua custodia In primis vnum
le coster cum quinque flammeis Item vnam rotam vnum blauncum
cooportorium Item vnum lodicum cum vno par’ vnam
togam nigram Item vnam brodij coloris Item
le nope bede Item vnum capitum nigri coloris Item vnam
ollam eream Item quinque ceruicalia Item vnam crucem
argentiam Item g oraculas argentias et curiales videlicet
le bedis of siluyr and curale ffor the quhilkis guidis the said
Alexander and alane ar’ becummyn souerty befor the aldirman
and balyeis to kep the saide Nicholl baxtar’ scathlace

Item the samyn thome quhit in a merchiment of the court for the
wrangus' wyth haldin of v s' g' fra Alexander rolland and Wat
rolland and as anent the vj s' scottis clamyt and restand gif
Wat rolland will suer' that he is nocht content of the saide v s'
that the said thomas say pay thaim ij s g'

Item alexander rollan in a merchiment of the court for the
wrangus' borcht strekyn' a pone thomas quhit for the tolle
of the barck
Item the said thomas is maid quicht be ane assis' anent

Item dicto secundo die aprilis Alexander rolland primo die vocatus ad sectam thome gledstan' pro xx s' in denarijs
aut denariatis non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriendo capere districtum et cetera

Anent ane borcht strekyn' of hym be Wat Rolland and sanderis'
rolland of ane li' gret and xxviij s' gret of the rest of ij li' gret
eftir the tenor of the borcht strekyn' a pone him to cont and Rakyn'
Of the quhilk he is maid coucht be ane assis'

Item the samyn dai Dauid menyes has fond alexander reid law
borcht that the said thomas quhit sall be schatillas' of hym and
of his parte bot as the curs' of commiing' law wyll

Item the said thomas quhit has fondyn' Robert blinseill law borcht
that the said Dauid menyes' and his parte sall be schatillas' of the said
Thomas bot as the curs' of comeing' law will

Johne fichet is in amerciament for strublance of thomas bening litstar / for the quhilk he is ordanit
to pay ij li' wax to the hali blude lycht in part of amendis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos
tercio de mensis aprilis anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes steuart adiudicatur in Amerciamento curie per assisam pro perturbio
thome Jameson et tenetur emendare ut Jura volunt

Item dictus Johannes steuart in amerciamento curie pro perturbio Willelmi portar'
in verbis

Item eiusdem dictus Johannes steuart receptus per presenciam assisam pro inobediencia
philippj Dunbreke seriandi excercentis officium suum

Johne of Knollis thomas fife thomas prat Dauid symson' alexander howison' androw murray eldar and gilbert
the vaus ar chosin for til devise see and prouide for the making of the foss' and performing of the wal
ling of this toune for the strinthing of the sammyn devisit ordanit and concludit be the aldirman
balyeis and consale of this burgh with consent and assent of the hale communite being warnit be the bel
Curia tenta per ballivos in pretorio vj die aprilis anno et cetera lxxxjo

The sammyn dai thomas rolland as procuratour for alexander rolland in amerciament for the wrangwis'
borgh streking on Robert senyour

Item it is decretit ordanit and deliuerit be ane assise William blindsel eldar beand forspekar
that Robert senyour salbring ane certificacion within yer' and dai oute of Danskyn' fra James gib
beldy / that the said James gib beldy causit Robert senyour tolay In certane gudis belangand
til Sandris rolland into the crayer' that was takin in the quhilk the said rolland
Rob senyour wes / And gif robert senyour bringis nocht hame certificacion be the said dai
the assise findis him dettour til alexander rolland of the forsaidis gudis / and gif he
bringis it hame thai fynde him quyte et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem ix die
mensis Aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxxxjo

Eodem die Agnes Rolland filia quondam Willelmi rolland constituit et fecit Dauid
matheson' suum verum procuratorem cum clausulis necessariis et oportunis ad
prosequendum Robertum senyhour de certis bonis sibj debitis cum quibus intromisit
in partibus spruys'

Eodem die Robertus senyhour' inuenit Willelmum tulydef pro eo plegium
legalem ad faciendum Alexandro honysson' quod de Jure facere tenetur

Eodem die Dauid matheson' et Robertus senyhour fidemedia obligatur
ad standum decreto et deliberacioni Ade craufurde Andree murray Roberti thome
prat et Walteri auchneyff in omnibus debatis et contrauersiis inter Ipsos
motis Item Idem Robertus senyour' obligatur ad standum decreto earundem
personarum pecios debatas et contrauersias inter Ipsum et Relictam quondam Walteri
blyndsell

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die
aprilis anno quosupra per balliuos eiusdem

Eodem die Robertus senyhour' et Dauid gychtan' quilibet Ipsorum
in amerciamento curie pro perturbio

Item eodem die Robertus senyhour' inuenit Symonem crafurde plegium legalem
quod Willelmus portar erit indempnis pro eo aliter quam Jura volunt

Item dictus Willelmus portar inuenit patricium Andree plegium legalem quod dictus
Roberti erit indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die decretum fuit per assisam per os Dauid mathei prelocutoris quod dictus
Robertus senyour' soluet Dauid gichtan xxiiij s' pro barella bituminis
infra terminum Juris dicto tamen Dauid soluen' naulum dicte barelle quod
extendit ad quinque s'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiiijo die
mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera lxxxjo

quo die Johannes stephani Adiudicatur inamersimento
pro iniusta perturbacione thome meldrum et emendabit partj lese et cetera prout Jura vo
lunt Idem Johannes adiudicatur inamersimento pro iniusta perturbacione Alexandri cristison et
emendabit prout iura volunt et cetera
Curia legalis tenta per balliuos xvto die mensis aprilis anno et cetera quo supra

Quo
die alisia lawsone' manu cepit et obligatur coram preposito et ballivis quod
tres vlnj pannj veredj coloris clamavit per andream rettre ad probandum quod est proprius
pannus et ex sua propria lana confectus Ad propriam curiam legalem post pascha

Eodem die Alexander reid Introduxit et presentauit Willelmum mathej filium secundam
quondam Johannis mathej et peciit inquisionem fierj et si dictus Willelmus fuit abilis
et legittime etatis ad intromittendum cum bonis suis propriis que sunt in custodia
ipsis Alexandri et matris dicte dicti villelmj vnde super hoc prepositus et balliui ma
ture auisatj partibus remotis et domum intratis delebrarunt et decreuerunt quod
dictam causa respectuatur vsque ad Curiam legalem posta pascha et Illo
die habebit inquisionem si fuerit legittime etatis aut non ad intromittendum cum vocis
suis propriis et Illo die ordinarunt

Eodem die Alexander roland vocatus Ad sectat'sectam thome gledstan 2o die huius processus
non comparuit quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriando Ad capiendum districtum et cetera

Curia legalis Capitalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Aberdene vltimo die mensis
aprilis Anno et cetera lxxxjmo Quo die sectis vocatis et curia confirmata
absentes patent et cetera Eodem die

Eodem die accedens ad barram henricus mortimar protestabatur pro quodam
annuo redditu decimo solidorum de quondam terra Jacente in le grein inter terram Alexandri
murnagh ex parte australj et terram hered' Jhoannis vobstar ex parte borialj
et terram andree mare ex occidentali parte et communionem viam regiam uersus orientem
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentavit preposito et ballivis tanquam secundo die eius processus Coram
Inquisicionis testibus Johanne echtsy Willelmo sprwnt et Dauid Duncani seriando

Eodem die dominus alexander vocat ex parte capellanorum Collegie protestabatur
pro quondam annuo redditu tredecim solidorum iiijor denariorum de quadam terra Jacente
in superiore parte vjcj de le schepraw inter terram alexandri de cavmera ex parte
occidentalj et terram thome prat ex parte australi et terram Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit coram ballivis
tanquam pro die eius processus testibus roberto senyor et thoma chapman
et Dauid Duncano seriando

Eodem die dominus Johannes de cawmera capellanus altaris sancti Jacobj cituati
in ecclesia parrochialj de Aberdene protestabatur pro quodam annuo redditu dua
rum marcarum exiunt de quadam terra Jacente in vico castri ex australj parte eiusdem
inter terram Jacobj leslie ex parte orientalj et terram hered' quondam Johannis Kuk
robertj Jhonson ex occidentali parte ex parte alteri Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit coram ballivis
tanquam primo die huius processus Coram hiis testibus nicilayo hel et Johan
ne scot scissore cum Dauid Duncano seriando

The sam day Jhone Currour of banf comperit in Jugiment befor the aldirman
and balyeis and askyt the dochtir of edmont adam kemisone vm
quhil burges' of Aberdene to be kend' til hir fadir land' as ane
burges' air the quhilk caus' wos' displacit ti this day xv day
is and the forsaid' Jhone currour protestit at quhat costis at
wor maid' vpone thir landis at that landis suld turne' to
na preiudice to thaim in tyme to cum

Eodem die Johannes Kyntor protestabatur pro quodam annuo redditu
d quatuor decim solidorum annuj redd sibj annuatim debitorum de vna
terra Jacente in vico furcarum inter terram gilbertj lech ex boriali parte
et terram ricardj cullan ex australj parte Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides pro dicto anno redditu
quos presentavit coram ballivis tanquam primo die huius processus coram hiis
testibus Johanne stefani et Johanne pawdy et Dauid Duncano seriando

The sammyn day William blindschil yongar' is oblist befor the
aldirman and the balyeis to pay and content til William red Ane half
hamburgh barel of salmont ful reid' and swet merchand' liek gud within
xv dayis nixt eftir folovand' the dait of

The samyn day the actione' and caus' of inquist set be the aldirman
and balyeis to tak ane' inquisicion gif Wil mathesone the secund'
sone of vmquhile Jhon matheson wos' lauchful eldar
til intromet with his awin propir gudis and landis ffor the
decicione' and determinacion of the said' caus' the aldirman and balyeis
chesyt this syis' quhas namys folowis In the frist Dauid
menyeis eldar James cummyn' Alexander howisone' Dauid symson Dauid
menyeis yongar Jhon vormat Jhon stevinsone William the hay
James craek thom prat androw murray eldar edmond lovsone' gil
bert morysone' And' Alexander scrogis and gilbert the Waus'
the quhilk personis the gret aith sworne' fyndis deliueris and determis
that the said William is of lauchful eld' til intromet' with gudis and
landis pertening to him be deces' of his fadir

The samyn day Robert senyour grantis him to be awand' til Alexander hovison
the waring of thre sprus' merkis xvij scot eftir the tenour of
his bil at he has deliuerit the said' Alexander for the siluer of
the gren claith

Eodem die Duncanus leis inuenit David Colisone' plegium legalem
quod Jacobus Crage erit indempnis pro eo secundum quod Jura volunt
Et dictus Jacobus Crage inuenit robertum blindschil plegium le
galem quod Duncanus leis erit indempnis pro eo secundum quod Jura volunt

The samyn day Ane sworne' syis has decretet and deliuerit that robert
senyour sal pay and content til matho cullan the waring of iij prus'
merkis and iiij scot eftir the frist ax within xv dayis

The ferd day of may It is ordand' be the aldirman and the consel that gif ony man at
Is awand' ony siluer to sanct Nicholayis verk within viij dayis eftir at thaj le
varnyt makis na pament the aldirman and balyeis sal pass' to thir wattiris
of the quhilkis thai haf tak of the towne and bring thir nettis haim
and thaj to fysch na wattiris quhil thaj haf maid' ful pament of al
that thaj ar awand'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio septimo die mensis maj anno quo supra

Quo die Donaldus sclatar adiudicatur in amerciamento Curie pro iniusta perturbacione
Dauid Duncanj et phillipi Drumbrek et emendabit eisdem prout Jura volunt

Eodem die emma vxor dicti Donaldj adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
Dauid' Duncanj antedicti et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum hominum

The xj day of may It is funde be Ane sworne' syis at William
blinsel youngar Is ful deptor' of sex pundis sex s' and
vj d' the qhilkis salbe pait to sanct Nicholais verk eftir as
It wos' promittit of befor' quhilkis sex li' vi s' vi d' is fund
at he Is awand' of his waltir maile of termes bigane
and wnpait hiddirtillis to this day
Curia legalis tenta xiiijo die mensis maij anno et cetera lxxxjo

Quo die Joneta Kemysone' et elezabet Kemysone' filie quondam ade
Kemysone burgensis burgj de Abirdene cum consensu et assensu sponse
Johannis mawar sponsi dictus Jonete fecerunt et constituerunt suos pro
curatores videlicet Jacobum ogiluy de deskfurd' mulitemmilitem magistrum gilber
tum hay de wry Johannem curroir de banfe thomam barde et Dauid
ogiluy de tolmade et valterum ogiluy de auchewyn Irreuocabiles
ad prosequendum sua breuia capelle regie penes certas terras et annuos
redditus infra dictum burgum Jacentes coram preposito et ballivis in forma
Juris debita et consueta et ad recuperandum saisinam et possessionenem
earundem hereditarias loco tempore oportunis promittens de rato et cetera

Eodem die Johannes lammyntone' comparens in Judicio et peciit a fyndelayo foris'
vigente le wedy de Irin' vigore plegij alias super ipsum porrecti quj quidem
fyndelaus peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et curia assigna
uit Idem fyndelayo hunc diem ad quindenam

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xviij die mensis mai
anno et cetera lxxxi

Quo die Robertus bouchane' in amerciamento curie pro in Justa perturbacione
Andree murray Juniorum et emendabit parti lese Iuxta visum proborum

Eodem die gilbertus chavmer accusatus per magistrum Johannem spens' ex parte
Nobilis dominj / Domini Andree steuart pro spolio terre dicti domini Jacentis in vico
castrj infra dictum burgum per presentam assisam repertus fuit quitus de omni spoliacione eidem
excepta porta exteriore eiusdem terre quam portam Ipsum gilbertum dicta assisa
decreuit restituere eidem domino aut suo certo procuratore ve deputato

xxj die maij anno quo supra et cetera The aldirman bailyeis consal and communite has
ordanit and concludit that the hawyne' salbe closit and lokyt in al gudly
hast ffor the quhilkis thai haue ordande A taxt tilbe resit of
al Inhabitans the towne' to the quantite and avale of it that will make
the costis tharvpon'

xxiij die mensis et annj supradictorum In curia coram ballivis protribunali sedentibus Willelmus de
mernys constituit Alexandrum mernys et Dauid talyour coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores
legittimos et deputatos speciales In omnibus causis actionibus et querelis ipsum constituentibus concer
nentibus summas pecuniarum quascumque sibi debit' petend' exigend' et recedend' et pro premissis
agend' et defendend' in latissima forma procuratorii Ipso promittens de Rato

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xxviij
die mensis maij anno Dominj supradicto

Quo die fyndelaus fores primo die legittime vocatus ad sectam Johannis lambynton'
pro iniusta detencione de xx le Wethy ferri Non comparuit Ideo precipitur seriendo
capere districtum a dicto findelao et cetera et premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad
secundum diem processus

div.head: nomina assise
div.p:
Duncanus fabhar de murcur thomas prat Willelmus blindsel Junior Jhoannes glenmaluing
gilbertus vaus' Johannes vormot Alexander hay gilbertus lech adam de Crafurd'
Dauid hil symon gardin andreas venton' et gilbertus quhit

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem nono die mensis Junij anno et cetera
lxxxjo Quo die persone superscripte ellecti fuerunt ad deseruiendum breue inquisicionis Capelle
regie alexander talloght et cetera

The sam day the action' and caus' mowyt betuix ane Nobil lady Elizabet
cwuts of hwutheon' A part and androw Weton burges' of abirdene on' that othir
part anens the clame of vj pipis wad clamant be the saide lady Duncan
sawchar' of murcour procurator to the said lady with consent of androw ventone hes
continwit the decicion' of the said matir to the penult day of this moneth
of Jun tobe decidit be for the aldirman balyes' and consell vnsuspec

The xiij day of Junj the aldirman ande the consel has frely giffin and grantit
with ane assent to ser Robert leis' the seruice of Sanct Vingeanis altar
the quhilk ser patrick tullogh has' had be certane yeris bigane'
gif It beis fwndyn wakand' ande gif It be nocht fand waikand
the said Schir' patrik to remane with the saide seruice

The sam day thomas of ogiston' has takin to preif the xviij stan' of wol
contenit in ane ak maid' abefor for the quhilk Jhon' Wormot wos'
brogh' has It beris in ane Ak maid' of befor til entir the said' thomas
to do At law wald' the said thomas comperit thes xiijday of Jun and
has profferit him befor the balyeis to preif the xviij stan of wol pait
ande al odir chak clamis William blindschil has to say to the said thomas
the quhilk todo the balyeis Androw brangh as assingit to him freday
eftir midsummir day nixt tocum in to this tolbutht or quhar It ples'
thaim best

The xvj day of Jun Alexander fraser of the Durris Is becumin to the Aldirman and
balyeis ful dettor that he sal restor furthwith ande but delay that half
net that Alexander of chavmer tuk or gert be tane' fra Wil gefart owt of the wattir
of the furdis

The sam day It is fund' be ane assise at Wil gefart sal pay til Alexander of chavmer
xiii s' iiij d' within xv dayis

The xxviij day of Junj It is ordinit be the Aldirman balyes consel and communite
that quha at Remvuis his gudis owt of the town' or At pass' him self
fra the defens of the towne' his gudis salbe Achet him self bonist for
yer and day and his takis gif he has ony salbe fra him for Al his
termis At he has thaim / and his hous' to be tane downe eftir as It is statut
in commond law .

Item so bekenne ick dat flippus' vame Haue
dat my de ballyun anders betalt heft van
abberdyn lxxxj

The iiij day of July the yer' forsaide the borcht strekine
be robert blindsell and alexander rede in the name and
the behalf of the abbot of Der' apone Dauid kynros'
for the wrangus' wyth haldine of half a schip and the
profitis of the samyn and xl s' of siluer is resplatyt to
fryday cum a xv dais and thomas of fyf borch'
for the entray of the saide Dauid that day to do
as law will

Quinto die Julij anno Dominj Mo cccco lxxxjo Duncusnus Duncanus ydill acceptus est in liberum
burgensem et confratrem gilde et soluet xxxiij s' et iiij d' Residium datur iij
fauorem georgij forbes de auchinthoull / prestito Juramento solito et consueto

The vj day of Julij in presence of the Aldirman and balyeis Wat thomson' grantit
at he wes' is brocht to androw bracagh' for richart henryson for vj s' g' as lent
siluer owt of flanderis the quhilk vj s' g' the balyes has chargit
the said Wat thomson' to pay to the said androw bracagh' vt
til his factor henry horum within xv dayis

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem ix die
Julij anno Dominj supradicto

Quo die gilbertus quhite adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento pro iniusta extensione plegij super
Robertum senyor de iij marcis prucie cum maiori de iniuste compoto / et dictus robertus
quitus per assisam de clameo suo antedicto

Curia burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xvij die Julij
anno et cetera lxxxjmo

The quhilk dai as anent the action and caus' movit betuix my lady of
huntle and Androw Wentoune twicheing the clame and the debate of v pipe of
wad clamit be the said lady / the said Androw beand Riply avisit
has referrit this actione aluterly to my lord of huntle and my lady
and to thare gude gracis / and to quhat persons ples' thaim totak til thaim
and to thare willis

In curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xx die Julij predicti Robertus
quhitson per prelocutorem suum Jacobum lesly posuit se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum pro iniusta
perturbacione Willelmi scot / vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento et emendare parti vt Jura volunt
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos burgi de abirdene xxiiij die Julij anno supradicto

The quhilk dai the aldirman balyeis and consale present for the tym has assig
nit til James craik monondai cum xv dais til preve the some' of vj li' xj s'
ix d' ob' clamyt be henry culan eftir the fourme of ane act made tharupon
producit be the said henry and red in the court pait or than to schaw lau
ful defesance or acquittance of the payment of the sammyn / And falyeand
tharof topay the some' forsaid

Et est memorandum quod Residuum actorum presentis curie et aliarum vsque ad ix diem Augusti
continetur iuxta burgenses factos eodem anno instante et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per Alexandrum menyes prepositum Jacobum
lesley et Thomam fife duos ballivorum dicti burgi ix die Augusti anno Domini et cetera lxxxj

The quhilk day William lesly and Jonet besat witnez producit be James craik
in the caus' movit betuix him and henry culan / sworn in presence of the said henry
examinit togiddir deponis and said that thai knaw that quhilum androw lesly payit
to henry culan v li' x s' of the Some' that James craik com borgh for
Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xiij die mensis et annj predicti

the quhilk dai Thomas of culan and Dauid Williamson' dueland in bogfarlan the gret aith
sworn and examinyt before the aldirman / thomas fife and androw branch balyes deponit and opinly
declarit / that thai wate weil and knawis / the some' of vj li' xj s' ix d' ob' clamyt be
henry culan payt to the said henry

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvj die Augusti predicti / Duncanus leis per concessionem propriam adiudi
catur iiijor pro iniusta perturbacione et lesione thome pyot et vxoris sue / matris dicti thome et
sororis eiusdem de quibus posuit se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum et tenetur emendare eisdem vt Jura volunt

xxmo die Augusti anno quo supra in curia affirmata / thomas narne accusatus de iniusta percussione
mariorie seruien' andree branche / posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de dicta perturbacione et cetera per concessionem
propriam adiudicabatur in amerciamento curie et emendare ad visum proborum virorum Et dicta marioria quita
per assisam de perturbio prefati thome

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxvijmo
die Augusti anno Domini supradicto

Quo die dominus Dauid Waus curatus de Aberdene pro se et ex parte cristiane
cadiou domestice sue clamabat Ricardus henrici de quatuor barellis salmonum
eis debitis in presencia prepositi et ballivorum protribunali sedentibus qui quidem Ricardus per suum prelocutorem rectorem
de owyn' peciit diem legalem ad respondendum et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad xvnam
ad respondendum dicto clameo vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Alexander menyes prepositus confitebatur se plenarie solutum ex parte ville de
duabus marcis per cristianam cadiou pro firma dimidij rethis de li furdis de qua
Dauid Kintor tenetur releuare ipsam cristianam et pro qua idem prepositus inuadiavit cratheram dicti Dauid eedem

Henricus culan primo die vocatus per Duncanum straloch seriandum responsurus plegio super ipsum
per Jacobum craik porrecto Non comparuit et cetera
